headline: 3 U.S. software stocks to buy, 2 to avoid: Goldman Sachs
summary: Investing.com -- Goldman Sachs has assumed coverage of the U.S. software sector, naming three stocks it is bullish on while cautioning against two names amid what it calls the “decade of agentic workflow.”

headline: OutSystems Welcomes SaaS Veteran Fay Sien Goon as Chief Financial Officer
summary: BOSTON, January 12, 2026--OutSystems, a leading AI development platform, today announced the appointment of Fay Sien Goon as Chief Financial Officer (CFO). In this role, Goon will oversee the company’s global financial operations, planning, and strategy as OutSystems continues to grow its market leadership and accelerate innovation in AI apps and agents.

raw.headline: OutSystems Welcomes SaaS Veteran Fay Sien Goon as Chief Financial Officer

headline: 2 Cash-Producing Stocks with Exciting Potential and 1 We Ignore
summary: A company that generates cash isn’t automatically a winner. Some businesses stockpile cash but fail to reinvest wisely, limiting their ability to expand.
